meanings.sent1: The group project was a mess because of the cohesionless teamwork.
meanings.sent2: The sand on the beach felt cohesionless as it slipped through my fingers.
meanings.sent3: The puzzle pieces were so cohesionless that they kept falling apart before I could finish.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like a cohesionless jigsaw puzzle, scattered and disconnected.
meanings.sent5: The relationship between the two characters was portrayed as completely cohesionless in the movie.

meanings.sent1: The cohesionless tape kept falling off the wall.
meanings.sent2: The dough was too cohesionless to form into a proper shape.
meanings.sent3: The stickers were so cohesionless that they wouldn't stay on the paper.
meanings.sent4: The team was like a cohesionless bundle of sticks, easily pulled apart.
meanings.sent5: The glue was disappointingly cohesionless, causing the project to fall apart.
